body_html:
@peterjc123 Whenever I try to install via the command

conda install -c peterjc123 pytorch cuda90

It starts to install then it stops at a certain point, then it retries again and it's ongoing for endless times.
I'm sure that my connection is good.

I'm installing on windows 8.1 with Cuda 9 installed, any help would be appreciated.

body:
@peterjc123  Whenever I try to install via the command 

> conda install -c peterjc123 pytorch cuda90

It starts to install then it stops at a certain point, then it retries again and it's ongoing for endless times.
I'm sure that my connection is good.

I'm installing on windows 8.1 with Cuda 9 installed, any help would be appreciated.
